summary.title: Photo Sharing Site Threat Model2
summary.description:
The photo-sharing site allows users to upload and retrieve photos via the Internet. On a high level It consists of the following major components and interactions:
1.User (external entity): Accesses site through browser/app.
2.Web Front-End (process): Handles authentication, upload, and retrieval requests.
3.Photo Storage (data store): Stores large photo files.
4.Database (data store): Keeps user and photo metadata.
5.Data Flows: Users upload/download photos (through HTTPS), metadata stored/retrieved from DB, photos stored/retrieved from storage.

Trust Boundaries:
1.Internet (User ↔ Web Front-End)
2. Internal network (Web Front-End ↔ DB/Storage)
